attributes.action: ban betting on any form of dog racing
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Betting on dog racing has led to overbreeding of greyhounds, other sighthounds and crosses of these (lurchers).
The regulation and self-regulation of the greyhound racing has not led to any reduction in the number of dogs being found dead having been killed inhumanely, injured, mutilated or running stray requiring rehoming. 

Betting should be banned to deter this maltreatment.

government_responses.details:
You signed a petition asking the Prime Minister to ban betting on any form of dog racing.

Her Majesty's Government has responded to that petition and you can view it here: 

http://www.hmg.gov.uk/epetition-responses/petition-view.aspx?epref=dogracingbetban


Her Majesty's Government
